sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from etb_barcode_info T where 1 = 1
T.productid = #productid#
T.batchno = #batchno#
T.barcodetype = #barcodetype#
T.createdate < #createdateHigh#
T.createdate >= #createdateLow#

select count(*) from etb_barcode_info T where 1 = 1
T.productid = #productid#
T.batchno = #batchno#
T.barcodetype = #barcodetype#
T.createdate < #createdateHigh#
T.createdate >= #createdateLow#
order by T.createdate desc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select T.* from etb_barcode_info T where 1 = 1 and T.status = 1
T.productid = #productid#
T.batchno = #batchno#
T.barcodetype = #barcodetype#
select * from etb_barcode_info where status = 1 and batchno = #batchno#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into etb_barcode_info(belongto,batchno,productid,barcodenostart,quantity,barcodetype,note,status,res01, res02,res03,res04,res05,createuid,createdate,updateuid,updatedate) values(#belongto#,#batchno#,#productid#,#barcodenostart#,#quantity#,#barcodetype#,#note#,#status#,#res01#, #res02#,#res03#,#res04#,#res05#,#createuid#,NOW(),#updateuid#,NOW())
select LAST_INSERT_ID() as value
sqlMap.update: update etb_barcode_info set barcodenostart = #barcodenostart#, quantity = #quantity#, barcodetype = #barcodetype#, note = #note#, status = #status#, res01 = #res01#, res02 = #res02#, res03 = #res03#, res04 = #res04#, res05 = #res05#, updateuid = #updateuid#, updatedate = NOW() where id = #id#
